t: A song of ascents. Of David.
I*pn rejoiced with those who said to me, “Let*ld us go to the house of the Lord.”*s
Our*ln feet are standing in*ld your gates, Jerusalem.
Jerusalem*pn is built like a city that*ld is closely compacted together.
That*ln is where the tribes go up— the*ld tribes of the Lord—*s to*ln praise the name of the Lord*s according*ld to the statute given to Israel.
There*ln stand the thrones for judgment, the*ld thrones of the house of David.

For*ln the sake of my family and friends, I*ld will say, “Peace be within you.”
